    • Method Detail

      • findByUrl

        java.util.Optional<Post> findByUrl​(java.lang.String url)
        Finds a post by its url.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the post to find
        Returns:
        Optional containing the post or empty if not found

      • findByCategoriesName

        org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Post> findByCategoriesName​(java.lang.String name,
                                                                 org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Finds posts by their category name.

        Tries to match the given category name to the name of the post category:
        post -> category -> name

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the category to find posts by
        pageable - the pageable object to paginate and sort results
        Returns:
        Slice containing posts

      • findByPinnedTrue

        Finds a post by its pinned flag.
        Parameters:
        pageable - the pageable object to paginate and sort results
        Returns:
        Slice containing posts
